• Director of PROCT ADT Module EngineeringTaichung City, Taichung City, Taiwan + 2 morePosted 2 years ago 3-5 years in leadership roles managing team performance with relevant semiconductor working experience Masters/bachelor’s degree in engineering or relevant field of experience 1+ years of experience in PAC (pump, abatement, chiller) Chemical engineering degree/background Less than 2 years Develop and supervise metrics for benchmarking Fabs performance, collaborate with Fabs and other functional areas to develop strategic objectives with agreed business processes, standardize PAC equipment, and lead multi-functional initiatives or enabling projects that support company objectives.
